General.Name: Jiangsu Huifeng Agrochemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Huifeng Bio Agriculture Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pesticides in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It engages in the crop cultivation; production of pesticides and hazardous chemicals pesticides, insecticides, fungicides, and vegetable preservatives; provision of technical consultation and technical services of herbicides, chemical products, knitted textiles, hardware, jiaodian, daily necessities, daily necessities, wood, building materials, electronic computers, and accessories; sale of agricultural products and packaging materials; and operation of the export business of self-produced products and related technologies, and self-operated and agency import of various commodities and technologies. Its products include dicyananthraquinone, dimethomorph, prochloraz, capryloyl bromoxynil, epoxiconazole, diflufenac, dimetholine, thidiazuron, etc. The company was formerly known as jiangsu Huifeng Agrochemical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Huifeng Bio Agriculture Co., Ltd. in August 2017. Jiangsu Huifeng Bio Agriculture Co., Ltd. is based in Yancheng, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: South Gate of Wanggang Gate, Yancheng, China, 224145
